amendment.description: Add at the end the following: SEC. 4. The requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII for a two-thirds vote to consider a report from the Committee on Rules on the same day it is presented to the House is waived with respect to any resolution reported on the legislative day of September 24, 2015, or September 25, 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 187 (Roll no. 498).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 187 (Roll no. 498).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Collins (GA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 187 (Roll no. 498).
